subject: Nascar Nextel Cup Series
Automobile Racing
Athletics and Sports
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Jimmie Johnson has a three-race winning streak and a 30-point lead over Jeff Gordon heading into Sunday’s race at Phoenix International Raceway.
snippet: Jimmie Johnson has a three-race winning streak and a 30-point lead over Jeff Gordon heading into Sunday’s race at Phoenix International Raceway.
